DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to estimate effects of different kinds, different dose of 5-HT3 receptor antagonists on prevention of hypotension after spinal anesthesia
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Different Kinds, Different Doses of 5-HT3 Receptor Antagonists on Prevention of Hypotension
